General.Name: NEXE Innovations Inc
General.Description: NEXE Innovations Inc. manufactures and sells plant-based single-serve coffee pods for use in single-serve coffee machines in Canada. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Surrey, Canada.

1.Name: Mr. Ashvani  Guglani
1.Title: Co-Founder, Pres, VP of Fin. & Director

3.Name: Ms. Kam  Mangat
3.Title: VP of Investor Relations & Corp. Strategy
